name: KFC Catch
description:
Welcome to KFC Catch. 

You have neem hired to work at KFC as a bucket and you must catch as many Chicken Legs as you can, Watch out though because there are some sneaky rats trying to make their way into your KFC as well.

This game was made in 24 hours for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 252

I had a lot of fun making this game and I hope you enjoy.
